Articles.Content:
I have a problem with landing on Mun.

It shouldn't be difficult for me, as I've got some experience with that. I landed on Minmus, Duna, Ike, and Laythe. But since I installed .25, every single lander I descent into Mun surface, simply.. explodes. Gear is set down, engine isn't touching the ground, and it should be everything good, but, well, it isn't as I wasn't able to land four differend landers. This problem also occures on Kerbin, and sometimes, on Duna. But only if I use gear, when I get down on chutes, it works perfectly.

Anybody can help me?

More information (such as screenshots) is helpful to see if there's something with your design or if it's something with the game. So I'll point you at this thread which tells you where to find that info: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

My first guess is that this is often to do with the terrain detail setting. If you have the terrain set too low, sometimes the surface doesn't line up with where the game thinks the ground is. If you have your terrain all the way down, try turning it up a bit and see if that helps.

Welcome to the forums!

Cheers,

~Claw
